functions.name: render_project_card
functions.description: Renders a project card component displaying project information in a structured, visually appealing format. Use this whenever discussing a specific project to provide rich UI.

description.description: Brief description of what the project does

status.description: Current status (e.g., '90-day experiment active', 'Launching January 2026', 'Framework complete')

tech.description: List of technologies used in the project

key_features.description: Key features or capabilities of the project

research_focus.description: Research focus or methodology (optional, for research projects)

functions.name: render_media_embed
functions.description: Renders a media player component for music or video content. Use this when discussing music, videos, or any media that should be playable inline.

title.description: Title of the media (song name, video title, etc.)

description.description: Description or context about the media

project.description: Related project or collaboration (e.g., 'Ghost & C-Cell', 'Soft Girl Era')

functions.name: render_project_list
functions.description: Renders a list view of multiple projects. Use this when users ask to see all projects, 'show me everything', or want an overview of work.

projects.description: Array of project objects to display

title.description: Optional title for the list (e.g., 'Active Projects', 'Research Initiatives')

functions.name: render_action_button
functions.description: Renders an action button that suggests a next step or provides a call-to-action. Use this when there's a clear logical next action for the user.

label.description: Button label text (e.g., 'Learn more about CLOS', 'Listen to C-Cell music', 'View Neural Child architecture')

action.description: Type of action the button performs

target.description: What the action targets (project name, media title, etc.)

functions.name: render_bio_card
functions.description: Renders a biographical information card showing Christopher's background, experience, and expertise. Use this when users ask about background, experience, or 'who are you'.

functions.name: render_philosophy_explanation
functions.description: Renders a formatted explanation of Christopher's philosophy, approach, or methodology. Use this when users ask about how he thinks, his approach, or philosophy.

title.description: Title of the philosophy concept (e.g., 'Empirical-First Research', 'Systems-Level Synthesis')

description.description: Explanation of the philosophy or approach

examples.description: Examples of how this philosophy manifests in work
